name: Wooden Blast - Block Puzzle
description:
Wooden Blast is a puzzle block game.
It moves the wooden block horizontally, filling the wooden block with one line, and eliminating for high score.
This game is fun and strategic.
It requires the player to observe, judge, move, and finally reach a line, or multiple lines.
Eliminate one line and score, if you eliminate multiple lines, you will get a high score.

HOW TO PLAY:
The Wooden Blast is simple: slide blocks left or right to create and clear full lines. WOODEN BLAST is free to play and easy to learn.
FEATURES:
- A new type of brain training puzzle, entertain your brain for minutes or hours
- Endless challenge, you can play forever yet you'll still find something undiscovered.
